properties.Problem to be addressed/Recommendation: No reservation and surrounding is prone to annual fires. Recommend to make dense planting of mixed vegetation comprising Agave/Aloe vera/Akkapana/Areca nut trees /Kithul/Kumbuk/Mee/ Godapara/Kaduru/Aththikka/Wal del/Riparian plants of randomly mixed seedlings at 500 mm grid interval.4. Apply mulching, organic manure and NPK fertilizer. Covered area 300 m2.
